title: M3: KantanLQR Projects
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: advanced. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 25 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: English. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: This activity demonstrates the project set-up process on the KantanLQR interface, as well as showing the reviewer interfaces for different project types. Students should complete this activity either before attempting to set up or carry out a project, or as an aid for project creation/completion.
